title: Free State of Jones - Gary Ross
text: True To The Time Period by Ugotta_B_Kidding Full Disclosure: I live in Jones County, MS :-)While not 100% historically accurate, it's pretty close. Movies always take a bit of artistic license with history. The movie is not fast-paced although the action scenes are very well done. Matthew McConaughey plays his role to the hilt and the supporting cast is quite good. Free State accurately depicts the brutality of the Civil War and the struggle of Newton Knight and his compatriots. Disappointing by The Rhythmist I was really looking forward to watching this movie at the cinema. It was thoroughly disappointing. Very, very boring. It just kept dragging on and on without any sense of purpose. And Iâ€™m the kind of person who thoroughly enjoys thought-provoking movies. Free State of Jones by Sista smurf This is about a man who abounded his wife and child and leaves inheritance to the second without car to the first.
